page.title: 03INDUSTRY/BUSINESS IN DYCE
page.content: Dyce has 4{industrial estates -} FARBURN, WELLHEADS, KIRKHILL and PITMEDDEN. Kirkhill is the largest. The companies in Dyce are a mixture of foreign and British companies. Many of them are{oil related}and some are {food related.}All the companies came to Dyce at different times but the average was around{1975. The biggest oil company is{BP}who came in 1970 and the biggest food company is{LAWSON}who came in 1935. The oil boom really started in 1975 and most companies in Dyce came because of it or have benefited from it. A representative from a local bank told us that her bank traded with six of the largest companies and that{the {future looked good for Dyce as long {as there is oil.
